algorithm_technique: Greedy approach based on last elements of two arrays
problem_summary_simple: Distribute numbers into two arrays based on the last elements of the arrays.
problem_summary_technical: Iteratively appends elements to arr1 or arr2 based on a comparison of their last elements.
key_insights: The problem specifies a deterministic rule for distributing each element.
The decision for each element depends only on the last elements of the two target arrays.
The initial elements are placed directly, and subsequent elements follow the comparison rule.
